refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A column marker for use in v:data-set, v:data-grid and v:data-source. This element should exist for each selected column of the SQL expression of the data set. If this is specified under data-set, data-source or data-grid controls, this must be the exact same columns as in SQL statement to be evaluated. If those element is omitted in data-set or data-grid, the columns will be extracted from compilation of the SQL statement. However, this will always be required for calls of stored procedures that return resultsets and for the data-source control.

formalpara.title: label = CalculateableValue
formalpara.para: Alternate text which could be used to display in column headings.

formalpara.title: input-format
formalpara.para: A sprintf format string for printing the input value

formalpara.title: output-format
formalpara.para: A sprintf format string for printing the output value

formalpara.title: xsd-stub-xhtml
formalpara.para: This attribute is for internal use only. It has no effect if added to the source VSPX file.

formalpara.title: width
formalpara.para: Visible width of the control when it is displayed in WYSIWYG tools when the source VSPX text is edited. The value of this attribute will not be used when the resulting HTML is rendered.

formalpara.title: height
formalpara.para: Visible width of the control when it is displayed in WYSIWYG tools when the source VSPX text is edited. The value of this attribute will not be used when the resulting HTML is rendered.

formalpara.title: debug-srcfile
formalpara.para: URI of the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-srcline
formalpara.para: Line number in the source document where the tag comes from.

formalpara.title: debug-log
formalpara.para: This defines what sort of data are saved to the debugging log.
